com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security.secret

Interface SecretStoreFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSecretStoreFacade, ScpCfSecretStoreFacade, ScpNeoSecretStoreFacade

    public interface SecretStoreFacade
    Facade interface encapsulating the access to concrete SecretStore and KeyStore classes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyStore getKeyStore(String name, SecretStore password)
      Retrieves a KeyStore by its name.
      Optional<KeyStore> getKeyStoreIfPresent(String name, SecretStore password)
      Retrieves a KeyStore by its name, if present.
      SecretStore getSecretStore(String name)
      Retrieves a SecretStore by its name.
      Class<? extends SecretStore> getSecretStoreClass()
      Returns the platform-specific implementation class of SecretStore.
      Optional<SecretStore> getSecretStoreIfPresent(String name)
      Retrieves a SecretStore by its name, if present.

    • Method Detail

      • getSecretStoreClass

        @Nonnull
Class<? extends SecretStore> getSecretStoreClass()
        Returns the platform-specific implementation class of SecretStore. For internal use only.
        Returns:
        The type of the platform-specific implementation.

      • getSecretStore

        @Nonnull
SecretStore getSecretStore(String name)
                             throws SecretStoreNotFoundException,
                                    SecretStoreAccessException
        Retrieves a SecretStore by its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name identifying a SecretStore.
        Returns:
        The SecretStore for the given name.
        Throws:
        SecretStoreNotFoundException - If the SecretStore cannot be found.
        SecretStoreAccessException - If there is an issue while accessing the SecretStore.

      • getSecretStoreIfPresent

        @Nonnull
Optional<SecretStore> getSecretStoreIfPresent(String name)
                                                throws SecretStoreAccessException
        Retrieves a SecretStore by its name, if present.
        Parameters:
        name - The name identifying a SecretStore.
        Returns:
        An Optional of the SecretStore for the given name.
        Throws:
        SecretStoreAccessException - If there is an issue while accessing the SecretStore.

      • getKeyStore

        @Nonnull
KeyStore getKeyStore(String name,
                              SecretStore password)
                       throws KeyStoreNotFoundException,
                              KeyStoreAccessException
        Retrieves a KeyStore by its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name identifying a KeyStore.
        password - The password to unlock the KeyStore.
        Returns:
        The KeyStore for the given name.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreNotFoundException - If the KeyStore cannot be found.
        KeyStoreAccessException - If there is an issue while accessing the KeyStore.

      • getKeyStoreIfPresent

        @Nonnull
Optional<KeyStore> getKeyStoreIfPresent(String name,
                                                 SecretStore password)
                                          throws KeyStoreAccessException
        Retrieves a KeyStore by its name, if present.
        Parameters:
        name - The name identifying a KeyStore.
        password - The password to unlock the KeyStore.
        Returns:
        The KeyStore for the given name.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreAccessException - If there is an issue while accessing the KeyStore.
